mapper.sql: ORDER_ID, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_TIME, ORDER_STATUS, NOTE, USER_ID, SEND_PLACE, SEND_MAN, SEND_PHONE, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, SALE_COUNT, VISIBLE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from orders
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into orders (ORDER_ID, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_TIME, ORDER_STATUS, NOTE, USER_ID, SEND_PLACE, SEND_MAN, SEND_PHONE, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, SALE_COUNT, VISIBLE) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{saleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{visible,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update orders
ORDER_ID = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORDER_NUM = #{record.orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TIME = #{record.orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORDER_STATUS = #{record.orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NOTE = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SEND_PLACE = #{record.sendPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_MAN = #{record.sendMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_PHONE = #{record.sendPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRODUCT_NAME = #{record.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_PRICE = #{record.productPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SALE_COUNT = #{record.saleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VISIBLE = #{record.visible,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update orders set ORDER_ID = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDER_NUM = #{record.orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TIME = #{record.orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDER_STATUS = #{record.orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NOTE = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SEND_PLACE = #{record.sendPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_MAN = #{record.sendMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_PHONE = #{record.sendPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{record.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{record.productPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SALE_COUNT = #{record.saleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VISIBLE = #{record.visible,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update orders
ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TIME = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SEND_PLACE = #{sendPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_MAN = #{sendMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_PHONE = #{sendPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SALE_COUNT = #{saleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VISIBLE = #{visible,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update orders set ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TIME = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SEND_PLACE = #{sendPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_MAN = #{sendMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_PHONE = #{sendPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SALE_COUNT = #{saleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VISIBLE = #{visible,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ORDER_NUM,ORDER_TIME,USERNAME PRODUCT_NAME, ORDER_STATUS, sum(PRODUCT_PRICE*SALE_COUNT) PRODUCT_PRICE, SUM(SALE_COUNT)SALE_COUNT,SEND_PLACE,SEND_PHONE,SEND_MAN from orders o left join user u on o.USER_ID=u.USER_ID where VISIBLE=1 GROUP BY ORDER_NUM ORDER BY ORDER_TIME DESC;
update orders SET VISIBLE=0 where ORDER_NUM=#{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
